jobDescription: Overview  Provides basic financial analysis support to Credit Analysts and Underwriting Staff. Inputs financial statements and tax return information into standardized software, then interprets the output for use in lending decisions. Responsibilities The position of Credit Analyst Intern is responsible for the following: Lend support in gathering and analyzing credit information on current and potential borrowersLend support in determining the advisability of granting credit for diversified types of loansData inputQualifications Must be currently enrolled in a degree program for finance or accounting.SDL2017
